reviews.review_msg: He is very organized and helpful whenever you ask for help. His ta's are friendly and well versed in their knowledge. The material is extremely boring but he tries his best to make it less boring.

This course is ridiculous. The reading requirement is MASSIVE (more like an english course). The tutorials did not provide help. The prof reads directly from Powerpoint and books. Not recommended for those who are unsure about taking this course. GOOD LUCK if you do!!
